name: RanveerBrarCooking
0:
”Alexa, open Ranveer Brar Cooking”
”Alexa, open Ranveer Brar Cooking and tell me some biryani dishes”
”Alexa, open Ranveer Brar Cooking and tell me the recipe for palak paneer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ranveer brar cooking
des: Hungama brings you the vast range of recipe by one of the most renowned chef in India currently - Ranveer Brar. Chef Ranveer Brar was the youngest executive chef at the age of 25 to have ever worked with a five-star hotel in India. At present, he is the senior executive chef at the Novotel Mumbai, Juhu Beach and is also overseeing the Dosa Factory and Shalimar in Cambridge, as well as Mantra in Boston. With Ranveer Brar expertise, we provide you the best of his recipes and exclusive tips for the day. Get 3 interesting and helpful Tip of the day to make sure you are updated with your tweaks in the kitchen. We make sure you get awesome and delicious recipe of the day, selected by Ranveer Brar just for you. Also get wonderful and easy to cook recipes for your daily - breakfast, main course, dessert, snacks, beverages, starters and all type of need. Missed the track of recipe in between? No worries, just say the word Repeat and get the recipe again to make sure you cook your food well. Want to get back to the menu, you were in or main menu where you started from? We have made sure you get there easily too. We provide all the options for your ease. Do enjoy the tasteful and yummy experience with us - Ranveer Brar Cooking.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
